args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let Îµ > 0, let p(z) be a nonconstant complex polynomial, or more generally a nonconstant power series
converging in { z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ }, and suppose p(z0) â‰  0. Then there exists a w in
{ z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ } such that |p(w)| < |p(z0)|.
-/

open Complex Metric Set

theorem exists_lt_abs_of_analytic_nonconstant {Îµ : â„} {z0 : â„‚} (hÎµ : 0 < Îµ)
  (p : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (hp_analytic : AnalyticOn â„‚ p (ball z0 Îµ))
  (hp_nonconst : âˆƒ z âˆˆ ball z0 Îµ, p z â‰  p z0) (hpz0 : p z0 â‰  0) :
  âˆƒ w âˆˆ ball z0 Îµ, Complex.abs (p w) < Complex.abs (p z0) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let Îµ > 0, let p(z) be a nonconstant complex polynomial, or more generally a nonconstant power series
converging in { z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ }, and suppose p(z0) â‰  0. Then there exists a w in
{ z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ } such that |p(w)| < |p(z0)|.
-/

theorem exists_lt_abs_of_analytic_nonconstant {Îµ : â„} {z0 : â„‚} (hÎµ : 0 < Îµ)
  (p : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (hp_analytic : AnalyticOn â„‚ p (Metric.ball z0 Îµ))
  (hp_nonconst : âˆƒ z âˆˆ Metric.ball z0 Îµ, p z â‰  p z0) (hpz0 : p z0 â‰  0) :
  âˆƒ w âˆˆ Metric.ball z0 Îµ, Complex.abs (p w) < Complex.abs (p z0) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let Îµ > 0, let p(z) be a nonconstant complex polynomial, or more generally a nonconstant power series
converging in { z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ }, and suppose p(z0) â‰  0. Then there exists a w in
{ z âˆˆ â„‚ : |z - z0| < Îµ } such that |p(w)| < |p(z0)|.
-/

/-- If p is analytic on the open ball ball z0 Îµ, nonconstant on that ball, and p z0 â‰  0,
then there exists w in the ball with â€–p wâ€– < â€–p z0â€–. -/
theorem exists_lt_norm_of_analytic_nonconstant {Îµ : â„} {z0 : â„‚} (hÎµ : 0 < Îµ)
  (p : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (hp_analytic : AnalyticOn â„‚ p (Metric.ball z0 Îµ))
  (hp_nonconst : âˆƒ z, z âˆˆ Metric.ball z0 Îµ âˆ§ p z â‰  p z0) (hpz0 : p z0 â‰  0) :
  âˆƒ w, w âˆˆ Metric.ball z0 Îµ âˆ§ â€–p wâ€– < â€–p z0â€– := by sorry
